{{Wireless embedded system |brand=Humax |model=Quantum T3 |fcc_date=09/15/2017 |manuf_country=China |is_manuf=Yes |type=wireless router, wireless system |fcc_id=O6ZT3 |pwr_v=12 |pwr_amp=1.5 |pwr_conn=barrel |cpu1_brand=Realtek |cpu1_model=RTL8197FS;RTL8197FS, G8M68P6 GG41E5; |fla1=8 |fla1_brand= |fla1_model= |ram1=128 |ram1_brand=Realtek |ram1_model=RTL8197FS |expansion_if_types=USB 2.0 |expansion_usb_num=1 |wi1_chip1_brand=Realtek |wi1_chip1_model=RTL8197FS;RTL8197FS, G8M68P6 GG41E5; |wi1_802dot11_protocols=bgn |wi1_txchains=2 |wi1_rxchains=2 |wi1_sstreams=2 |wi2_chip1_brand=Realtek |wi2_chip1_model=RTL8812BR;RTL8812BRH, G9J46E1 GG41; |wi2_802dot11_protocols=an+ac |wi2_txchains=2 |wi2_rxchains=2 |wi2_sstreams=2 |eth_cpu=true |sw_cpu= |sw_brand=Realtek |sw_model=RTL8366 |lan_speed=1G |lan_ports=2 |wan_ports=1 |flags=Wave2, MU-MIMO, |802dot11_protocols=abgn+ac |default_ssid=We Love You So Much |default_user=admin |oui=DC:D3:21 |oui_eth=DC:D3:21 }}
:• '''867Mbps''' - 2SS 5GHz [https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/IEEE_802.11ac#Data_rates_and_speed 802.11ac] (80MHz chan.), :• '''300Mbps''' - 2SS 2.4GHz [https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/IEEE_802.11n-2009#Data_rates 802.11n] (40MHz chan.) = '''''1200 Mbps'' class'''
{{TagLine|AC1200 Roaming & Mesh Wi-Fi Router}} :{{ProductPage|https://quantum.humaxdigital.com/wi-fi-routers/}} The RAM embedded in the RTL8197F may be 128MB. * Web GUI: http://dearmyrouter.net An unknown chip is visible near the Ethernet ports in the FCC photos. :It is likely a [[Realtek]] Ethernet chip.
